name: v50.5.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-telephone: Add disable-analytics prop by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1641
* va-card: Add variation which adds an icon at the top, center by @humancompanion-usds in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1640
* va-input-telephone: Refactor validation / event emit payload by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1635
### Fixes
* va-input-telephone: Update maturity value by @danbrady in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1624
* va-link: Fix external link text wrapping by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1625
* va-input-telephone: improve grammar of error message by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1627
* va-input-telephone: Delay phone number validation until blur by @amyleadem in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1631
* va-combo-box: Restore filtering functionality by @amyleadem in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1630
* va-input-telephone: Improve screen reader experience and fix re-selection display error by @amyleadem in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1626
* va-textarea: Fix hint to ensure font-weight is normal by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1629
* va-link-action: Show icons in print preview by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1634
* va-segmented-progress-bar: Fix text wrap bug by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1639
* va-additional-info: Updated the vertical bar width from 7px to 4px by @babsdenney in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1638

## New Contributors
* @babsdenney made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1638

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v50.4.0...v50.5.0

name: v50.3.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-text-input & va-statement-of-truth: add prop for adding Datadog privacy class on error message by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1600
* va-table: add data-sort-value attribute for raw number value sorting by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1604
* va-input-telephone: add component by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1595
### Fixes
* va-combo-box: make all options persist in dropdown after selection by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1602
* va-accordion: logic update to fix 2 clicks to collapse bug by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1603
* va-combo-box: populate options when loading by @KyleCardwell in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1605
* va-search-filter: make headings consistent across breakpoints by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1611
* va-search-filter: update accordion-items to be heading level 3 by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1609
* va-alert-sign-in: replace straight apostrophes with curly ones by @RyanMunsch in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1613

## New Contributors
* @RyanMunsch made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1613

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v50.2.2...v50.3.0

name: v50.1.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-file-input and va-file-input-multiple: add password input field by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1548
* va-critical-action: focus state styling updates and rename component by @bellepx0 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1553
* va-breadcrumb: add prop to conditionally use #content or a custom href for the current page by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1565
### Fixes
* va-date: remove empty options by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1540
* va-memorable-date: Replace date processing by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1536
* va-combo-box: handle deleting the selected value with keyboard by @KyleCardwell in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1544
* va-link: remove duplicate screen reader content by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1552
* va-date: show default days with no month selected by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1551
* va-telephone: vanity to allow full replacement by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1549
* va-button: increase line-height by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1545
* va-alert: add action link Storybook example & adjust header alignment by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1560
* va-combo-box: fix combo box options not populating on component re-render by @oleksii-morgun in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1564
* va-alert, va-maintenance-banner, va-modal, va-promo-banner: close icon by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1557
* va-critical-action: staging review updates by @bellepx0 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1563
* va-combo-box: aria status to include opt group count by @oleksii-morgun in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1550
* va-memorable-date: change lifecycle method for handling dash by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1555
### Other Changes
* CSS-Library: remove custom list styles by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1556
* CSS-Library: add semantic gutter tokens by @micahchiang in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1559
* CSS-Library: add block display to eyebrow styling class by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1566


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v50.0.0...v50.1.0

name: v50.0.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### Breaking Changes
* va-pagination: update for maximum of seven slots by @1Copenut in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1476
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-checkbox: swap out legend element  by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1523
* va-alert-critical: add new component by @bellepx0 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1533
### Fixes
* va-official-gov-banner: swap icons by @gsong in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1534
* va-alert: use headline text for alert close button ARIA label by @rsmithadhoc in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1535
* va-checkbox: fix interactive elements in description by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1531
* va-combo-box: when clicking into input, if no text is selected, select all of it by @KyleCardwell in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1532
* va-combo-box: user typed matches auto-select by @KyleCardwell in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1537
* Form Components: add message-aria-describedby checks by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1538
### Other Changes
* Storybook: remove formation imports by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1524
* CSS-Library: align list styles to uswds by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1508

## New Contributors
* @KyleCardwell made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1532

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v49.4.1...v50.0.0

name: v49.4.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-select: add forms patterns support by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1510
* va-button: Adding a fullWidth prop by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1512
* va-file-input: add percent upload support by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1500
* va-select: Adding a full-width prop by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1517
### Fixes
* va-language-toggle: adjust font size and padding by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1502
* va-accordion: prevent nested va-accordion-items from propagating up by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1509
* va-checkbox: add normalized font size token to label by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1513
* va-checkbox: fix aria checked assignment by @rsmithadhoc in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1514
* va-need-help: align header font-size with Figma by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1520
* va-checkbox: Fix interactive elements in description by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1515
### Other Changes
* CSS-Library: Addition of vads-c-eyebrow class by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1503
* CSS-Library - update asset paths to reference css-library and uswds packages, add missing files to css-library by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1519


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v49.3.0...v49.4.0

name: v49.0.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### Breaking Changes
* va-file-input-multiple: update data for vaMultipleChange to return more detail (BREAKING) va-file-input: fix bug with upload message not resetting by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1460
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-file-input-multiple: allow for slots to be conditionally rendered on file inputs by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1458
* va-file-input: display previously uploaded file by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1461
* va-file-input: add statusText prop by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1463
### Fixes
* va-telephone: add health resource center number to constants by @Dr-Pongo in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1455
* va-select: Adding 'vaSelectBlur' event by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1466
* va-checkbox and va-radio-option: Improved a11y  by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1442
* va-alert: Fixing it so close button on slim alerts doesn't overflow by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1467
### Other Changes
* CSS-Library: Moving fonts loading to core by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1469
* CSS-Library: add primitive and semantic spacing tokens by @micahchiang in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1468

## New Contributors
* @Dr-Pongo made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1455

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v48.4.0...v49.0.0

body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-button: add loading variation by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1446
* va-search-input: add clear search button by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1450
### Fixes
* va-accordion: add custom event to expand/collapse all button by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1445
* va-date: remove unnecessary aria labels for select by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1447
* va-alert-sign-in: Hides no-sign-in-link when not present by @asg5704 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1452
* va-link: add aria-label to all variations by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1448
### Other Changes
* css-library: add `img` folder to dist by @micahchiang in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1441
* css-library: fix the html element's font-size so it will respect browser settings by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1444

## New Contributors

name: v48.3.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-table: Add striped variation by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1439
### Fixes
* va-alert-sign-in: Modifying headline to use rems by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1438
* va-process-list-item: Move status eyebrow into header so that it gets read by screen readers by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1437
* va-table: Fix screen reader not announcing sort by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1433
* va-file-input-multiple: Fix multiple emits of vaMultipleChange by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1440


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v48.2.0...v48.3.0

name: v48.2.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-process-list: add ability to customize eyebrow status text by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1422
* va-combo-box: add new component by @oleksii-morgun in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1373
* va-process-list-item: add HeaderLevel element with part=header for custom styling by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1427
* va-checkbox: add indeterminate prop by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1426
* va-alert-sign-in: add new component by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1424
* va-table: add scrollable prop by @janechodance in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1428
### Fixes
* va-accordion: remove aria-controls and aria-expanded from expand all button by @1Copenut in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1400
* va-table: Parse html to plain string before setting it to CSS content by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1431
* va-language-toggle: Add label text to event, remove va-link analytics by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1434
### Other Changes
* CSS library: add address block  by @rsmithadhoc in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1432

## New Contributors

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-language-toggle: add component by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1386

* va-link & va-link-action: update analytics tests and lifecycle by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1407
* va-table: update loading lifecycle and fix Stencil axe error by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1410

body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-process-list-item: Add text to describe status by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1362
* Add custom message to va-file-input and update message in va-file-input-multiple by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1367
* va-table: add sorting variation by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1358
### Fixes
* va-modal: set box-sizing to border-box to prevent text overflow by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1357
* va-accordion: open accordion when media is print by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1363
* va-process-list: update status eyebrow text to uppercase by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1365
* va-process-list: change color variable from usa to vads by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1368
* va-table: show table header for non-stacked & stacked small screen by @harshil1793 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1364
* va-table: update va-table-inner to properly scope table header row to columns by @1Copenut in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1370
### Other Changes
* CSS Library: replace FA icons for action link and alert classes by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1371

## New Contributors
* @bellepx0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1361

name: v46.3.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-link-action: Adding an aria label prop by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1321
* va-checkbox-group: add message-aria-describedby prop by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1327
### Fixes
* va-search-input: don't fire extra submit event on keyboard form submit by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1320
* va-link: fix double outline on focus by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1323
* va-checkbox & va-radio-option: Remove option-label by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1329
* va-file-input: Focus on delete after closing modal by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1326
* va-checkbox: Fix description slot by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1331
* **multiple components**: focus outline color fixes by @harshil1793 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1305
### Other Changes
* CSS Library: Add mobile forms surface tokens by @danbrady in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1317
* CSS Library: add hub-records color utility classes by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1322
* CSS Library: Remove progress-box padding by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1324
* CSS Library: update breakpoint names and adjust `small-desktop-screen` value by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1325


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v46.2.3...v46.3.0
